attributes.action: Make sure the Evesham Train Station Ticket Box doesn't close.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that older people who still go on trains might not have the ability to buy tickets online and they will still use the ticket box.
attributes.background: Make sure the Evesham Train Station Ticket Box doesn't close.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action but for the whole country: 

Require train operators keep ticket offices and platform staff at train stations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636542

You may be interested to know that there was a recent a debate in Parliament and a Committee 'evidence session' about railway ticket office closures. You can find out more here: https://ukparliament.shorthandstories.com/cet-railway-ticket-offices/index.html
